about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack from the otome game, Deliver Us From Evil (DUFE). Listen to hauntingly beautiful original scores in high quality (.wav) and immerse yourself in the gothic world of DUFE, where angels and demons walk amongst us.
Composed by Ednar Pinho and featuring Leandro Cavalcante in the Alma del Gran Pompeo track.
